name: Wiggly Wet Noodle
description:
Two players only (two gamepads, or keyboard and one gamepad)

Try to knock the beach balls through the goal buoys to score points, but don't get knocked off the dock.

User WASD or Left Stick to move your end of the noodle. If you fall in the water you can't move, but your partner can pull you back up (maybe).

ESC or Back button to quit. Start or Enter to continue if you die.
